title: Mop Top
description: From the author of the bestselling picture book Corduroy, comes a story of one boy who refused to get a haircut.Moppy is a five-year-old boy who knows one thing: He does not want to get his hair cut. But when Moppy is mistaken for an actual mop at the grocery store, he realizes he's got to face the barber.
author: Don Freeman
